title: Angular Directive Generator
description: Creates a new Angular directive with specified configuration

name.description: The name of the directive in camelCase format (e.g., 'highlightText', 'tooltipHandler')
name.x-prompt: What is the name of your directive? (in camelCase)

element.description: The HTML element this directive will target (e.g., 'div', 'button', 'input'). Use '*' for all elements
element.x-prompt: Which HTML element will this directive target?

import-path.description: The library path used for importing this directive (e.g., '@myorg/shared/directives')
import-path.x-prompt: What is the import path for this directive?
